game.miscDetails: Note that this game didn't have any labels. The poly play system was the second East-German arcade machine. Quite, frankly it was a slapped-together piece of crap. It used inferior russian computer hardware, an old television converted to rgb and a cabient made out of chip-board laminated to look like fake wood. We use the terms 'arcade contols' in a generic sense on this one. The joystick and button were salvaged from industrial machines and are nothing like real arcade controls.
